  physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Mahaweli Ganga River in Kandy
 Sri Lanka. There is thick vegetation on either side of the river. The photograph shows the river at low tide. There is a man swimming in the river in the middle of the photograph
 with a small boat behind him. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Mahaweli Ganga River in Kandy, Sri Lanka. There is thick vegetation on either side of the river. The photograph shows the river at low tide. There is a man swimming in the river in the middle of the photograph, with a small boat behind him. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
